ddf.catalog.transformer.queryresponse.geojson

Class GeoJsonQueryResponseTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddf.catalog.transformer.queryresponse.geojson.GeoJsonQueryResponseTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryResponseTransformer

    public class GeoJsonQueryResponseTransformer
extends Object
implements QueryResponseTransformer
    Implements the QueryResponseTransformer interface to transform a SourceResponse instance to GeoJSON. This class creates JSON objects for the list of Metacards that are the results from a query. This class leverages the GeoJsonMetacardTransformer to convert metacards to JSON.
    See Also:
    GeoJsonMetacardTransformer, QueryResponseTransformer, Metacard, Attribute
